_header: For to ask graciously he proffereth us
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — three monorhyming lines

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
for to ascke graciusly he profurth vs& þat we schul haue
                    sicurly he be hetyth vs& þat is thyng þat schl newur fayle
                    vs
